body: This is my first doujin when im still wandering from xxx site
This doujinshi will always be my special one, the first hentai I've ever read before.

I found it, it's the one. it's the one that introduced me to this world of culture when I was a mere shota, looking for some tits. oh how much I've grown. it's been years, the nostalgia... i have reached... enlightenment
